mean_en: a person who performs in front of an audience and makes people laugh by telling jokes or funny stories or by acting in a way that is funny :an actor who plays roles that make people laugh
word_etyma: comed喜剧 + ian名词后缀 → comedian 喜剧演员
short_phrase: a funny comedian with a red nose
sentence: He is my favorite comedian--makes me laugh every time.
sentence_trans: 他是我最喜爱的喜剧演员---每次都让我开怀大笑。
